etymology.interpretation: Combines the notion of work/craft with a course or procedure, emphasizing organized, methodical work. Extended to mean the discipline of engineering as well as concrete projects and construction works.

examples.chinese: 这个工程已经开工(這個工程已經開工)。
examples.english: This project has already begun construction.

examples.chinese: 工程进展顺利(工程進展順利)。
